title: MyHomeTechVerse
description: A full-stack modern **E-commerce Platform** featuring a dedicated **Admin Dashboard**`for comprehensive product, order, and user management.Engineered a scalable platform using **Next.js 14** with server-side components for fast initial load times andimproved SEO Developed a protected **Admin Panel** to handle CRUD operations for products and manage order fulfillment. Integrated **Cloudinary** for scalable cloud storage and delivery of product images and media assets.  Configured **SMTP** email service (via Gmail) for sending transaction receipts, order confirmations, and customer notifications.
shortDescription: A full-stack modern **E-commerce Platform** featuring a dedicated **Admin Dashboard** for comprehensive product, order, and user management.

title: Web motions
description: A dedicated showcase of advanced, modern web animations and sophisticated UI/UX effects integrated into a performant web application. Created dynamic, high-fidelity UI animations using industry-standard libraries like **Framer Motion** and **GSAP** (GreenSock). Focused on optimizing animation performance across different devices, ensuring smooth 60fps transitions and complex motion sequencing. Developed the application using the **NextJS** framework, leveraging its capabilities for routing and optimized rendering of UI elements.
shortDescription: Refined my skill by implementing all the industry standards.

title: MovieFlix
shortDescription: Simple movie info website powered by TMDB API useful for discovering movies
description: MovieFlix is a feature-rich movie information website that leverages the power of The Movie Database (TMDB) API to provide users with a comprehensive and user-friendly platform for exploring and discovering movies.

title: ProductVideoExample - Landing Page
shortDescription: A landing page to practice my core CSS skills.
description: I made this website to practice my core CSS skills. This was a template that I found and tried to recreate it exactly how it looked.
